1.0.0.name: wordpress/easy-nofollow
1.0.0.description:
This plug fits into the editor. After you install this plug-in you will see additional TinyMCE button, with which you can easily set the rel = "nofollow" on external links.

The plugin's main features are:

  • a plugin for TinyMCE, which adds a button to the editor nofollow
  • any outgoing link adds optional rel = "nofollow"
